movie.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
movie.plot: A biopic of 20-year-old Francis Ouimet who defeated his golfing idol and 1900 US Open Champion, Harry Vardon.

movie.title: The Untouchables
movie.plot: Young Treasury Agent Elliot Ness arrives in Chicago and is determined to take down Al Capone, but it's not going to be easy because Capone has the police in his pocket. Ness meets Jimmy Malone, a veteran patrolman and probably the most honorable one on the force. He asks Malone to help him get Capone, but Malone warns him that if he goes after Capone, he is going to war.

events.title: Ip fights at the Mid Autumn Festival

movie.title: Ip Man 4: The Finale
movie.plot: Following the death of his wife, Ip Man travels to San Francisco to ease tensions between the local kung fu masters and his star student, Bruce Lee, while searching for a better future for his son.

events.title: Billie Jean King beats Bobby Riggs at tennis

movie.title: Battle of the Sexes
movie.plot: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 19 nominations.

movie.title: Paranormal Activity
movie.plot: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie and Micah become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

events.title: the General's report is leaked to the public

movie.title: War Machine
movie.plot: A rock star general bent on winning the “impossible” war in Afghanistan takes us inside the complex machinery of modern war. Inspired by the true story of General Stanley McChrystal.

movie.title: The Shape of Water
movie.plot: An other-worldly story, set against the backdrop of Cold War era America circa 1962, where a mute janitor working at a lab falls in love with an amphibious man being held captive there and devises a plan to help him escape.
